arts.ttl: Liverpool were humiliated in defeat by Man City and their key problem is there for all to see - here's how Arne Slot can learn from Pep Guardiola to get back on track, writes LEWIS STEELE
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Mikel Arteta and Co may have been trembling watching City but, if they were casting an eye over Liverpool , they may have been rubbing their hands.

arts.ttl: Glory for Guardiola as Slot pressure mounts: Four key talking points from Man City 3-0 Liverpool
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes a closer look at four key talking points following Manchester City's statement 3-0 win over reigning Premier League champions Liverpool on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Man City crushes Liverpool 3-0 in Pep Guardiola’s 1,000th game
arts.sum: Not only did City totally dominate the defending Premier League champion and one of Guardiola’s fiercest rivals in a career spanning Spain, Germany and England - but the result firmly established his team as a genuine contender for the title this season. Thiago got his second in stoppage time to seal the win, which left Newcastle 14th in the standings and just two points above the relegation zone.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 3 Liverpool 0: Match report from the Etihad.
arts.sum: Manchester City have beaten Liverpool 3-nil today at the Etihad after a virtuoso display from Jeremy Doku. O’Reilly laid the ball off for Doku who cut inside on his right foot and unleashed a stunning strike that gave Giorgi Mamardashvili no chance in the Liverpool goal to give Manchester City a 3-nil lead.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 3 Liverpool 0: City player ratings from City's win.
arts.sum: Jeremy Doku put in a sparkling performance to be Manchester City’s man-of-the-match in their big win. Here are the City player ratings as Manchester City beat Liverpool 3-nil at the Etihad Stadium today.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville forced into change he 'never' makes by Liverpool disaster vs Man City
arts.sum: Jeremy Doku scored a sensational goal to help Manchester City see off Liverpool at the Etihad Stadium, with Gary Neville left so impressed he made a rare admission

arts.ttl: Liverpool manager Arne Slot rues 'clear and obvious error' in Man City defeat and highlights decision made by the SAME referee in favour of Pep Guardiola's side last season
arts.sum: Virgil van Dijk thought he had equalised for Liverpool but his header was chalked off by VAR due to Andy Robertson being adjudged as offside and interfering with play.

arts.ttl: Limp Liverpool Schooled by Pep Guardiola Masterclass—They Must Wake Up, Fast
arts.sum: Nine months ago the Reds comprehensively outplayed Manchester City on their own patch. But it was a very different story as Pep Guardiola celebrated his 1,000th game in management.

arts.ttl: Man City 3-0 Liverpool: Doku steals show as Guardiola's milestone crowned with impressive win
arts.sum: City were close to opening up Liverpool when Doku played a defence-splitting pass into Phil Foden, but, fresh from being recalled by Thomas Tuchel for England, the midfielder couldn’t take it into his stride with only Virgil van Dijk to advance past. The star turn was Jeremy Doku, who capped a man-of-the-match display with a fine goal to put the home team three goals to the good with just under half an hour still to play.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 'in crisis': Roy Keane delivers damning verdict on Arne Slot's side after 3-0 drubbing by Man City - as Jamie Carragher names the Reds star who is 'at the heart' of all their problems
arts.sum: The Reds, who are defending Premier League champions, have already lost five games this season and are eighth in the league standings, eight points behind leaders Arsenal.
